backend/main.mo: Main canister logic defining user profiles, file uploads, and CRUD storage for properties, houses, agents, and other property types with access control mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing branding-update features, affected components, and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining build and deployment steps for the PWA.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template configuring PWA metadata, icons, fonts, and loading the main app entry.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, and generated icon assets.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, cache versioning, and cache-first/network-first fetch strategies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app with router setup, protected routes, and automatic service worker registration.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: Authentication context provider managing login state, persistence, and credential verification.
frontend/src/auth/authStore.ts: Manages auth state and credentials in localStorage, including reading, writing, clearing, and verifying stored credentials.
frontend/src/components/AddReminderDialo: A dialog form for creating reminders with note, date, and time, handling submission and reset.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with branding, online status, settings link, and logout handling using auth context.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout component with header, main content outlet, and footer including a caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/AttachmentPicker: UI for selecting, renaming, and removing file attachments using a hidden file input.
frontend/src/components/AttachmentPrevie: Modal for previewing images, videos, or PDFs with fullscreen and download options.
frontend/src/components/OfflineBanner.ts: Displays online or offline status using a badge based on network connectivity.
frontend/src/components/ReminderModal.ts: Modal that shows reminder details and provides dismiss and delete actions.
frontend/src/features/matching/dismissed: Stores and retrieves dismissed match IDs in localStorage with add, check, and clear functions.
frontend/src/features/matching/matchEngi: Computes buyer-property match candidates using category, budget, location, and area logic.
frontend/src/features/search/searchIndex: Filters records by matching query text across multiple fields for simple search.
frontend/src/forms/CommercialLandForm.ts: Form component for creating or editing commercial land records with status, details, and attachments, then saving via local repository hooks.
frontend/src/forms/CustomerForm.tsx: Form for creating or updating customer records, handling priority, category selection, and saving through the local repository.
frontend/src/forms/HouseForm.tsx: Form to manage house property records including status, details, attachments, and saving to local storage.
frontend/src/forms/OtherCategoryForm.tsx: Generic form for miscellaneous property categories, capturing basic info, status, attachments, and saving via repository hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity persistence, and related state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalRepository.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on local DB items like records, agents, attachments, reminders, and deals.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks and returns browser online/offline status using event listeners.
Manages checking and requesting browser storage persistence and exposes related status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useStorageMode.ts: Reads and updates the app's storage mode using local storage helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AgentDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed agent information, supports deletion, and handles attachment download for citizenship documents.
frontend/src/pages/AgentListPage.tsx: Shows a list of agents, provides a form to add new agents, and supports saving optional citizenship attachments.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerListPage.tsx: Lists customer records with search and starring functionality using local record storage.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing records, search, starred items, reminders, and match suggestions with actions to manage reminders and starred status.
frontend/src/pages/DealPage.tsx: UI to create, list, and delete property deals, linking buyers and properties with validation and form handling.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Simple login form validating credentials via AuthProvider and navigating to the dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/NewEntryPage.tsx: Category selector that loads the appropriate form for creating new customer or property records.
frontend/src/pages/RecordDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed record info with editing, starring, deletion, attachments, and property matching for customers.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings for credentials, storage mode, data import/export, and persistence requests, with logout actions.
frontend/src/pages/SoldListPage.tsx: Displays sold property records with search filtering and links to detail pages.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers a service worker, checks for updates, and prompts users to reload when a new version is available.
frontend/src/storage/localDb.ts: Implements IndexedDB storage for records, agents, attachments, reminders, and deals with upgrade handling and CRUD functions.
frontend/src/storage/storageMode.ts: Manages storage mode preference (local or canister) using localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/customerCategory.ts: Provides customer category constants and utilities for mapping legacy values and converting categories to property types.
frontend/src/utils/excelIo.ts: Builds CSV export files for records, agents, reminders, and deals, and handles CSV formatting and download.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for parsing URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, layouts, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, issues, and feature requests for updating branding assets and fixing a broken ICP canister deployment link. Also defines image replacement requirements and tracks new deployment-related tasks.
